The NATS exporter exports OpenTelemetry data (traces, metrics, logs) to NATS subjects.

## Configuration

```yaml
exporters:
  nats:
    url: nats://localhost:4222
    timeout: 30s
    retry_on_failure:
      enabled: true
      initial_interval: 5s
      max_interval: 30s
    traces:
      subject: otel.traces
    metrics:
      subject: otel.metrics
    logs:
      subject: otel.logs
```

### Authentication

```yaml
exporters:
  nats:
    url: nats://localhost:4222
    auth:
      credentials_file: /path/to/user.creds
    # Or use one of:
    # user_info:
    #   username: user
    #   password: pass
    # token: my-token
    # nkey_file: /path/to/seed.nkey
```

### TLS

```yaml
exporters:
  nats:
    url: tls://localhost:4222
    tls:
      cert_file: /path/to/client.crt
      key_file: /path/to/client.key
      ca_file: /path/to/ca.crt
```
